title: The Mining and smelting of copper
brief_description: Copper is a conductor of electricity used for electrical wiring, prevents rust. Shows copper mining scenes in Arizona, Utah and Montana which produce three-quarters of copper mined in the USA. Also shows mining operations including smelting.
